Reviews.Title: These batteries are an excellent much needed addition to the EOS M
Reviews.Author: thetoolman
Reviews.Content: I have used these two Halcyon batteries for the last few months and, while I was a little sceptical at first do to their low price, they they have won me over.  They consistently charge well and have no issues with the camera.  As an additional bonus they tend to last a bit longer than the Canon battery.  The EOS M seems to drain batteries faster than most other mirrorless cameras and this inexpensive battery duo is a must buy.

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 2 Halcyon Brand Battery
Battery Specs: 2200 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Halcyon Support: Includes 5 Year Halcyon Replacement Warranty. Full Membership Access to Halcyon Customer Support Website
Frustration Free Packaging. No wasteful and dangerous plastic blister packs.
Compatible with all cameras which take Canon LP-E12 Batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Two Halcyon 2200 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement Battery for Canon EOS M 18.0 MP Compact Systems Camera and Canon LP-E12
